![](https://mxroute.io/images/logo.png)

**MXroute.io - SMTP Relay Service, by MailChannels**

Here are our offers, that are still available for order, yearly plans will expire really soon ;-)
 
**LET 10k**
 
**10k emails per month**
  
SMTP Relay Access 
 
MailChannels Cloud Access
  
40€ per year - [Signup here](https://mxroute.io/LET.html#plans)
  
----------------------------------
 
**LET 5k**
  
**5k emails per month**
  
SMTP Relay Access
  
MailChannels Cloud Access
  
30€ per year - [Signup here](https://mxroute.io/LET.html#plans)
  
----------------------------------
  
**LET 2k**
  
**2k emails per month**
 
SMTP Relay Access
  
MailChannels Cloud Access
 
20€ per year - [Signup here](https://mxroute.io/LET.html#plans)

----------------------------------

Monthly plans:

**Starter**
 
**10k emails per month**
  
SMTP Relay Access 
 
MailChannels Cloud Access
  
5€ per month - [Signup here](https://mxroute.io/#plans) 

More monthly-based plans available in our website https://mxroute.io

----------------------------------
  
Benefits of signing up for our plans:
 
- MailChannels integration in WHMCS (including overages, full automation);
  
- 2FA available in WHMCS (secure your account properly);
  
- Support by us and MailChannels - as you're a Cloud user, you're entitled for their 24x7 Support as well;
 
- Plugins available for cPanel/Plesk;
  
- Awesome email delivery by MailChannels;
  
_*Listed prices do not include VAT - EU residents are subject to VAT as per the MOSS Agreement (companies with a valid VAT number are VAT exempt where individuals without a valid VAT number are charged the country's VAT rate)._
 
 
Due to the recent price hikes in MailChannels, we've also created new plans targeted at big volumes, for Enterprise/ISPs at www.mxroute.io
